mapper.update: UPDATE boards SET views = #{views} WHERE boardNum = #{boardNum};
mapper.select: SELECT b.boardNum, b.boardTitle, b.boardContent, b.boardWriter, b.fileName, b.views, b.createdDate, b.modifyDate, COALESCE(COUNT(c.commentNum), 0) AS commentCount FROM boards b LEFT JOIN comments c ON b.boardNum = c.boardNum GROUP BY b.boardNum, b.boardTitle, b.boardContent, b.boardWriter, b.fileName, b.views, b.createdDate, b.modifyDate ORDER BY b.createdDate DESC LIMIT #{startNum},#{amount};
